ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:21:41 [Issue ID 4000-507313] urn:comicvine:4000-507313 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:02:25. [Issue ID 1515627]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Trooper Jack Deth has been sent back in time to the year 1985 to hunt down the man that killed his wife, but he quickly finds himself on the wrong side of the law. Wanted for a murder he didn't commit, Jack is thrown into a jail full of zombified trancers ready to tear him apart piece by piece. His only hope is in the hands of his future wife Lena. Features a movie poster variant, limited to 2,000 copies.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------|----------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Marcelo Salaza | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | ? | 2 |
Note: The solicit for the issues states the variant is limited to 2,000 copies but the credits page in the comic lists 1500.
